scripts.dev:bg: sh -c "nohup node --watch server.js > /tmp/flowfocus-backend-dev.log 2>&1 & echo $! > /tmp/flowfocus-backend-dev.pid && echo Backend started:$(cat /tmp/flowfocus-backend-dev.pid)"
scripts.dev:stop: sh -c "if [ -f /tmp/flowfocus-backend-dev.pid ]; then kill $(cat /tmp/flowfocus-backend-dev.pid) 2>/dev/null || true; rm -f /tmp/flowfocus-backend-dev.pid; fi; pkill -f 'node --watch server.js' 2>/dev/null || true; pkill -f 'node server.js' 2>/dev/null || true; echo Backend stopped"
